title: Hell Girl 1
description: SHE’S COMING FOR YOU. . . .When you thirst for revenge, there’s a surefire way to get Simply go to the strange website that appears only at midnight, and enter the name of your enemy. The Hell Girl will appear to drag your tormentor to eternal damnation. But you will have to pay a price . . . your soul!
author: Miyuki Eto
